name: After the 7th Day
description:
Game: After the 7th Day - Ludumdare 35

After the 7th Day" is a pet game with elements of visual novel, or point & click, or whatever…

Have fun!

Controls:
Mouse does everything.
Highlights are interactive.
Press Enter or Click to name him.

Credits:
Léo James: Programing, Game Design
Saulo Daniel: Art, Game Design
Marcelo Melo: Game Design
Renan Souza: Programing, Audio, Game Design
